title: Experience Travis Heights charm in this large, one bedroom duplex with
posting_body: Price: $1,150
Bedrooms: 3
Bathrooms: 2
Description: Experience Travis Heights charm in this large, one bedroom duplex with the original hardwood floors and many unique 1930's antique fixtures and hardware.
Lots of modern updates mixed in with the old world charm!
Recently remodeled kitchen with granite counters.
Remodeled bathroom.
The hardwood floors throughout the home have just been refinished.
Interior has been freshly painted.
The high ceilings and many windows fill the rooms with natural light and give a spacious feel.
Charming living room with archway into dining area and kitchen.
Large master bedroom is filled with light and overlooks the back yard.
Utility room with stacked washer and dryer.
Relax in the garden or enjoy your private front porch.
This is a classic Travis Heights gem!
You can walk or Uber to shops and restaurants on South Congress Avenue or head over to the natural springs at Stacy Pool for a swim.
It's just a few minutes to downtown Austin with lots of music and entertainment.
